content: शंब(व) {%a%} [शंब्-अच्] {@--1@} Happy, fortunate. {@--2@} Poor, unfortunate. --बः {@--1@} The thunderbolt of Indra. {@--2@} The iron head of a pestle. {@--3@} An iron chain worn round the loins. {@--4@} Ploughing ‘with the grain’ or in the regular direction. {@--5@} The second ploughing of a field. (शंबाकृ means ‘to plough twice’).
शंभः {@--1@} A happy man. {@--2@} The thunderbolt of Indra. {@--3@} The ironhead of a pestle.
